item.title: Ben Armstrong Dumps Own Token, is a Massive Crash Incoming for BEN? | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
Popular digital currency YouTuber Ben Armstrong, known as BitBoy Crypto has dumped all his BEN token holdings, a week after he promised his community to have the fan tokens locked for 6 months. item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
Crypto News: Coinbase, the largest cryptocurrency exchange in the US, recently announced its support for Sui (SUI) in its trading platform. This announcement comes as a direct result of the firm’s principal notion, which is to bring credible crypto assets to its retail customers and to further bolster the use of Web3. item.dc:creator: Coingape Staff
item.description:
HBAR Crypto News: The Hedera Governing Council, which is in charge of the open-source Hedera proof-of-stake public network, announced their newest Governing Council member today. Indian crypto exchange WazirX has provided more clarity regarding its ties with Binance. WazirX announced in a post yesterday that the world’s leading crypto exchange Binance controls the WRX token. item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:

item.title: Indian Apex Web3 Body, Crypto Exchanges Push To Restore UPI Access | Coingape
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
India’s apex body for Web3 companies Bharat Web3 Foundation and crypto exchanges have urged the Indian government and the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) to restore UPI access to exchanges. The Indian government’s stance regarding crypto and Web3 remains vague. While they support blockchain and some Web3 developments, the authorities are primarily against cryptocurrencies that

The post Indian Apex Web3 Body, Crypto Exchanges Push To Restore UPI Access appeared first on CoinGape.
